item.title: Lenovo IdeaPad 3i Chromebook 82N4003CUS
item.description: The Lenovo IdeaPad 3i Chromebook is designed for optimal performance and portability, featuring a vibrant 15.6 inch FHD display and seamless operation with the Intel Celeron N4500 processor.

item.title: Lenovo 300e Touchscreen Chromebook
item.description: Lenovo Chromebook with multitouch display and compact design for Chrome OS.

item.title: HP Chromebook 14 14a-na0226nr
item.description: The HP Chromebook 14 is a sleek, portable laptop designed to keep up with your home, work, and school demands.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook CX1
item.description: Durable and lightweight Chromebook with long battery life and comprehensive connectivity options.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook CM14
item.description: A durable and responsive Chromebook featuring the MediaTek Kompanio 520 processor.

item.title: Acer Gateway Chromebook 311 CBO311-1H-C1MX
item.description: The Acer Gateway Chromebook 311 offers a seamless ChromeOS experience with fast performance and robust security features.

item.title: uname Linux T-Shirt
item.description: Spread your love for Linux by showing the best output the uname command can give on your t-shirt.

item.title: Close Windows and Run Linux
item.description: A funny t-shirt for fans of Linux that suggests to close Windows and run Linux instead to have a more joyful life when spending time with your computer.

item.title: Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C8ZW
item.description: The Acer Chromebook R 11 CB5-132T-C8ZW is an 11.6-inch laptop powered by a 1.6 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N3060 processor.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip C100PA-DS03
item.description: The ASUS Flip C100PA-DS03 is a convertible Chromebook with an IPS touchscreen that can be flipped over from 0 to 360 degree so the device can be used as a tablet or laptop.
